__e: It would be an insult to my father's memory.
No, you know what? That's an insult to crap.
His actions were an insult to that court as well as everyone who believes in our system of justice.
Aidan, listen. It is an insult to my memory that you would rather imagine these two throwing daisies on your grave than getting up and actually doing something about this.
Because that is an insult to people who were there and who did what had to be done.
It's an insult to every man, woman and child in the city.
Because the offer was an insult to me-- to you...
It's insulting to me that you think I need help.
If he doesn't ask for help, it would be an insult for me to offer.
